/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with buildings and trees, creating a corridor of urban life. Cars and pedestrians add to the dynamic nature of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the colors of the scene.
